content: embrace your inner dragon with this captivating dragon wing scarf crochet pattern perfect for intermediate crocheters this pattern creates a stunning 36 long scarf that measures 23 at its widest point the pattern includes detailed written instructions and photo tutorials to guide you through each step ensuring a successful and enjoyable crafting experience whether you re making it for yourself or as a gift this dragon wing scarf is sure to be a cherished piece in your wardrobe **unique features-** intermediate level pattern suitable for crocheters looking to expand their skills unisex and adult-sized design for versatility worked flat in one piece with a seamless construction for a polished finish textured pattern stitch creates a visually appealing design includes detailed written instructions and photo tutorials for ease of crafting **materials needed-** yarn 350-400 yards of dk weight yarn such as crystal palace yarns panda pearl hook 4 5mm us size 7 0 gauge 8 5 stitches by 16 row = 4 inches in pattern stitch
